gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 144, Hornets 113
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Hornets, 144-113. Buddy Hield recorded 25 points, four rebounds, and three assists for the Pacers, with Tyrese Haliburton adding 19 points and 13 assists in the victory. Terry Rozier tallied 25 points, nine rebounds, and seven assists for the Hornets in the defeat. The Pacers improve to 14-12 in the regular season, while the Hornets fall to 7-19.
